dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5741 IH: The Restrict Ugly Money Portraits of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Torres of New York (for himself and Mr. Liccardo) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to prohibit representations of a living President on United States coins or currency, and to prohibit representations of any living person on any United States currency.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the The Restrict Ugly Money Portraits of 2025 or the TRUMP Act of 2025.

section.header: Prohibition on certain representations on United States coins and currency
section.text: Section 5112 of title 31, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: No portrait or bust of any living President may be included in the design of any United States coins or currency, including commemorative coins.
No portrait or bust of any living person may be included in the design of any United States currency.
